name: Valet Parking 1989™
description:
Valet Parking 1989 combines fun
driving with the humour and style of
the late 80s. Park and deliver cars as
fast as possible in this time
management puzzle game. The setting
is California where glamorous
celebrities let you park their radical
sports cars and luxurious limousines.
Play the movie-like story mode to
unlock levels for endless play. Earn
money to buy a cool car and drive to
the beach in style. Don't let the VIP
guests wait any longer, get your
waistcoat on and push the pedal to
the metal!
